'''Petyr Karstark''' is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. He is not expected to appear in the series, being long dead by the time it starts. He is one of the earliest recorded members of [[House Karstark]], and an ancient ancestor of Lord [[Rickard Karstark]].
sections.In the books: Petyr Karstark is referenced only in the TV adaptation of ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' and has no corresponding counterpart in the books.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Petyr Karstark was the second born son of [[Commard Karstark]] and his wife [[Regan Karstark| Regan]].

===[[Season 1]]===
He has an entry in ''[[The Lineages and Histories of the Great Houses of the Seven Kingdoms]]''.<ref>"[[A Golden Crown]]"</ref>
